Texts.Chs: 棒极了！接下来，你需要在你的^green;加工台^reset;制造一些^orange;铜线^reset;。有了它我就能对你的^green;传送器^reset;进行应急修理。它的缓冲器被注册为降级的，而这不是最佳状态。
Texts.Eng: Great work! Next, you are going to need to make ^orange;Wire^reset; at the ^green;Machining Table^reset;. With that I'll be able to jury-rig a fix for your ^green;Teleporter^reset;. Its buffer is registering as degraded, which is not optimal.

Texts.Chs: 你好，陌生人！我检测到了你的^orange;守护团能量信标^reset;进入了星系，并立即进行了调查。 当时你的飞船^red;与这里的恒星发生了一次碰撞^reset;，因此我继续研究，并重新定向了你的导航系统。
Texts.Eng: Greetings, stranger! I detected your ^cyan;Protectorate Energy Signature^reset; entering the system and investigated immediately. You were on a ^red;collision course with the sun^reset;, so I went ahead and redirected your nav system.

Texts.Chs: 我现在可以帮你修复你的飞船^green;传送器^reset;。它应该不再有17.3%的几率会干扰你的DNA！现在你需要找到一个足够强大的能量源来组装一个新的^orange;STL引擎^reset;，以使你的飞船能够再次触及太空旅行。
Texts.Eng: I can now fix up your ship's ^green;Teleporter^reset;. It should no longer have a 17.3% chance of scrambling your DNA! Now you'll need to find an energy source sufficient to assemble a new ^orange;STL Drive^reset; to get your ship space-worthy.

Texts.Chs: 我可以借助^cyan;守护团甘愿^reset;之手来调查我无法到达的局部异常，而 - 你可以利用我的帮助来修复您的飞船。所以，我们没有理由不合作，嗯？
Texts.Eng: I could use the help of a ^cyan;Protectorate Agent^reset; to investigate a local anomaly I am unable to reach, and -you- could use my help getting your ship repaired. So, why don't we work together, hmm?

Texts.Chs: 我建议你尽快熟悉^orange;研究菜单^reset;，因为如果你想让你的飞船重新触及星空，这是唯一可行的手段。为什么不先研究一下^orange;农业学^reset;来迈出第一步呢？
Texts.Eng: I suggest familiarizing yourself with the ^orange;Research Menu^reset; as soon as possible, since that is going to be your sole means of progress if you wish to ever get this ship space-worthy again. Why not ^green;Research^reset; a little into ^orange;Agriculture^reset; to get you started?

Texts.Chs: 要进入洞穴，您需要这把 ^orange;钥匙^reset;，我偶然心血来潮在地表^green;破旧的老房子里^reset;找到了它。它似乎与洞穴反应，允许人进入其中。^red;请随身携带这把钥匙，否则你无法进入洞穴^reset;
Texts.Eng: In order to access the cave, you're going to need this ^orange;key^reset; that I interestingly found in the ^green;old, ruined house^reset; on the surface. It seems to react with the cavern, allowing entrance. ^red;Keep it with you, or you won't be able to enter^reset;!

In your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; the ^orange;Research^reset; menu will be the most important part, providing you with access to Blueprint unlocks for -all- crafting. Access the ^orange;Research^reset; menu via ^green;[Shift] + [Mouse 1]^reset; or the ^orange;Beaker^reset; icon within the ^green; [ Mouse 1 ]^reset; menu.

Texts.Chs: 现在，让我们看看你的行头？ 虽然那里不会特别危险，但要确保至少通过^cyan;装甲和武器^reset;研究树^orange;制造军备作坊^reset;。你会需要装甲和武器的。
Texts.Eng: Now let's see about your part of the bargain, shall we? It shouldn't be too dangerous, but do make sure you at least have ^orange;Built an Armorworks^reset; through the ^cyan;Armor and Weapons^reset; research tree. You'll want armor and weapons.

Texts.Chs: 按^green;[Shift + 鼠标左键]^reset;打开^orange;工具配置^reset;对话框。在这里，你可以调整你的物质枪，甚至是根据需要将其他工具或武器放入主插槽。只需拖放即可！
Texts.Eng: Press ^green;[Shift + Mouse 1]^reset; for the ^orange;Tool Configuration^reset; dialog. Here, you can adjust your Matter Manipulator, or even place different tools or weapons into your Primary slots if you desire. Just drag and drop!

Texts.Chs: 看起来我的出现很是及时，你的^orange;FTL引擎^reset;已经^red;毁坏^reset;了，而你的推动引擎基本上也彻底失效了。你的传送器也炸了。每次使用都会增加灾难性故障的风险。
Texts.Eng: Seems I was just in time, too. Your ^orange;FTL drive^reset; is ^red;broken^reset; and your impulse drive is basically dead in the water. Your teleporter is fried, too. Each use increases the risk of a catastrophic failure.

Texts.Chs: 全宇宙一流的科学流派经常会参观这里，在这里，你能学到很多东西。快点在你的SAIL上找到^orange;科学前哨站^reset;的位置吧！
Texts.Eng: Some of the galaxy's finest scientific minds work there, and there is a great deal you could learn. Find the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset; on your SAIL!

Texts.Chs: 非常感谢你为我所做的调查！你的帮助让我^green;非常感激^reset;！如果不嫌弃的话，请务必去^orange;参观一下^cyan;科技前哨站^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Thanks for investigating that for me! Your help is ^green;deeply appreciated^reset;! If you haven't already, be sure to ^orange;visit the ^cyan;Science Outpost^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 第一步完成！请使用你的^orange;熔炉^reset;将矿石熔炼成锭。接下来，请在^cyan;农业^reset;研究中^green;研究^reset;如何在建立^orange;采集工作台^reset;，并制造一张。
Texts.Eng: That takes care of step one! Use your ^orange;Furnace^reset; to smelt ores into metal bars. Next, ^green;Research^reset; how to make a ^orange;Foraging Station^reset; in the ^cyan;Agriculture^reset; research tree. Craft one.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;远古设备^reset;可能会允许你接入^orange;能量源^reset;！我听说这些设备对其制造者的科技会有所反应。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Ancient Device^reset; will probably allow you to interface with the ^orange;power source^reset;! I've heard they react to the technology of their creators.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;个人三度仪^reset;^red;非常重要^reset;，不要弄丢了，永远都不！不过……如果你弄丢了，你仍然可以在你的^orange;改造台^reset;中重新制作一个新的。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; is ^red;EXTREMELY^reset; important. Do not throw it out. Ever! Should you lose it, you can always create a new ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; in your ^green;Tinker Table^reset;.

The ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; is absolutely essential to your survival. The primary ^green;[Mouse 1]^reset; function provides access to ^orange;Stats^reset;, ^orange;Mech Configuration^reset;, ^orange;Tech Upgrades^reset; and more. You've got one in your ^cyan;[I]nventory^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 还差一步就能修好你的^green;传送器^reset;：一个^orange;电磁铁^reset;。如果你不介意，就在你的^green;加工台^reset;为我制作一个吧？
Texts.Eng: There's one more step to getting your ^green;Teleporter^reset; fixed: an ^orange;Electromagnet^reset;. Build one at your ^green;Machining Table^reset; for me, if you don't mind?

Texts.Chs: 采集工作站能帮助你^green;生存^reset;和^green;耕作^reset;。你已经证明自己的能力，所以请继续努力，^green;研究^reset;如何制作^orange;加工台^reset;制造一张。你会在^cyan;工程学^reset;研究树中找到它。
Texts.Eng: This station will help you with ^green;Survival^reset; and ^green;Farming^reset;. You've proven you're capable, so go ahead and ^green;Research^reset; how to make a ^orange;Machining Table^reset; and then craft it. You'll find it in the ^cyan;Engineering^reset; research tree.

Texts.Chs: 要想离开这个星球，你需要^green;修理你的飞船^reset;。但是，让我们从小事开始：在^cyan;地质学^reset;研究树中^green;研究^reset;如何制造^orange;熔炉^reset;。然后制作一座熔炉！
Texts.Eng: To get off this planet, you're going to need to ^green;repair your ship^reset;. But let's start small: ^green;Research^reset; how to make a ^orange;Furnace^reset; in your ^cyan;Geology^reset; research tree. Afterwards, craft one!

Texts.Chs: 你问什么？ 这个星球的地表上有一处我进不去的^orange;黑暗洞穴^reset;，我先前曾检测到来自这里面的^orange;奇怪的读数^reset;，它们足够强大，其源头或许能够提供^green;让你离开这个世界的能量源^reset;。
Texts.Eng: What for, you ask? There's a ^orange;Dark Cavern^reset; on the surface I can't fit inside. I've previously detected ^cyan;strange readings^reset; coming from within. They're strong enough that the source ^green;may provide the energy source you need^reset; to get off-world.

Texts.Chs: 为什么不拿上我闲置的这把备用^green;矿镐^reset;呢？ 它应该可以帮助您更快地挖掘，节省一点时间。不用努力多久，你就能用上^green;高级工具^reset;了。
Texts.Eng: Why don't you take this Spare ^green;Pickaxe^reset; I had lying around. It should help you dig a bit faster for a little while. Before long you'll have ^green;superior tools^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 选择^orange;个人三度仪^reset;之后，按^green;[鼠标右键]^reset;打开^orange;任务管理器^reset;，这里你可以进入FU的相关任务，完成它们可以得到有用的回报和独特的战利品。
Texts.Eng: With the ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; selected, press ^green;[Mouse 2]^reset; for the ^orange;Task Manager^reset;, where you can access your FU related Quests. Completing these will result in useful rewards and unique loot.

Texts.Chs: 如果没有^orange;三度仪^reset;，我们就不能进行下一步工作。为了使能源生效，它需要和这个设备进行正确的交互。
Texts.Eng: Without a ^orange;Tricorder^reset; we won't be able to proceed. It needs to interface with this machine to properly enable the power.
